attachments.title: Mindful Challenges
attachments.text: Thank you for your interest! Mindful Challenges offers a new way to bring emotional well being to the people you work with. With Challenges you can set a mindfulness and meditation goal for your community, and then via a public dashboard your coworkers can track their progress and the progress of the community as a whole towards that goal. Please leave your email so someone from our team can follow-up with you and provide you with additional information about Mindful Challenges.

messages.text:
Hi there! I’d like to share with you our newest product - Mindful Challenges, a new way to bring emotional well being to the people you work with. With Challenges you can set a mindfulness and meditation goal for your community, and then via a public dashboard your coworkers can track their progress and the progress of the community as a whole towards that goal.

Click the link if you would like to learn more about bringing Challenges to your community! <https://goo.gl/64dasA>
